solution_line_template: If Maude's age is {maude_age} by the time Anne's age is four times Emile's age, Emile will be {emile_multiplier_maude} times as old as Maude, which totals {emile_multiplier_maude}*{maude_age} = {emile_age} years.

If Emile's age is {emile_age} years old by the time Anne's age is twice her number, Anne will be {anne_multiplier_emile}*{emile_age} = <<{emile_age}*{anne_multiplier_emile}={anne_age}>>{anne_age} years.
